root.message: The DATA_COMP field for indicator 3-7-2, translated into en
root.data: The fertility rate of adolescents is calculated as a ratio. The numerator is the number of live births for women between 15 and 19 years old and the denominator is the estimate of exposure to pregnancy for women between 15 and 19 years old. The calculation is the same for the 10-14 year old age group.
